sentences.sContent: A new computer system entails a lot of re-training.
sentences.sCn: 使用新的计算机系统需要大量的再培训。

sentences.sContent: Some foreign travel is entailed in the job.
sentences.sCn: 做这份工作有时要到国外出差。

trans.tranCn: 使需要，必需；承担；遗传给；蕴含
trans.tranOther: to involve something as a necessary part or result
